title: Prepare a Commission Agreement
description: Two brokers, one representing the landlord and one the tenant, must execute a commission agreement before lease negotiations begin.

tasks.description: The landlord's agent drafts a commission agreement specifying the percentage of the lease value that will be paid as commission.
tasks.expected_outcome: A draft commission agreement is created.

tasks.description: The agreement specifies how the commission will be split between the two brokerage firms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The commission split (e.g., 50/50) is clearly stated.

tasks.description: Both brokers sign the agreement before the lease is sent to the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: A legally binding commission agreement is in place.
